description:
In this classical-inspired 2D game, players will explore challenging magical environments, team up with forest animals and defeat nasty enemies.

- Play solo or with a friend as Lily and Lucas
- Explore mystical woods, ancient deserts and the fiery mountains of Solaria
- Befriend animals that can guide you on your journey
- Glide and attack with the help of your magical companion
- Find hidden passages, collect all feathers and search for magical Owl Eggs
- Defeat or avoid various enemies
- Unlock different costumes

Experience a wonderful adventure and save Solaria!
name: Lila's Tale and the Hidden Forest
